T02D3035:76b-0: @76b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3035:76b-1: gza' rnams kyi las grub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D3035:76b-2: dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar phris la seng ldeng gi
T02D3035:76b-3: phur bu brgyad la gza' brgyad kyi snying po so
T02D3035:76b-4: sor bris la / rtse mo la dug khrag gis byugs la so so'i gnas su gzugs so //
T02D3035:76b-5: gtor ma brgyad sha sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bsham mo //
T02D3035:76b-6: dbus su gtso bo'i bum pa la yab yum gyi
T02D3035:76b-7: mtshan ma btab la snying po bsdus pa lan brgya
T02D3035:76b-8: rtsa brgyad bzlas la sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal bar
T02D3035:76b-9: bskyed pa'i thugs ka nas 'od zer lcags kyu'i gzugs
T02D3035:76b-11: gza' so so'i snying ga nas bzung ste rnal 'byor
T02D3035:76b-12: pa'i las kyi mtha' grub par gyis shig par mnga'
T02D3035:76b-13: gsol / de nas gza' las chu 'grol ba la
T02D3035:76b-14: sogs pa gang byed pa la bsnyen pa brgya bzlas
T02D3035:76b-16: de nas sngags pa bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi nas rgyud rdzogs pa sum brgya klag ste /
T02D3035:76b-17: brgya tshigs kyis mchod bstod bya zhing /
T02D3035:77a-1: yab yum la bdag nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
T02D3035:77a-2: de nas gza' brgyad kyi las ji ltar byed pa'i
T02D3035:77a-3: don khas blangs la gtor ma gtang zhing rang gis
T02D3035:77a-4: ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzhung gi las la sbyar na
T02D3035:77a-6: gza' brgyad kyi las ma grub pa rnams grub par
T02D3035:77a-7: byed pa'i cho ga /'dod pa rab tu zhi ba
